transcript_chunks.text: know if you've heard but i want to blow your mind this came up when me and bless were talking about this a couple of weeks ago uh and you being pain that it's november this is gonna pain you even more so gta 3 came out in 2001 then vice city came out in 2002 and then san andreas came out in 2003 right gta 3 was just set in present time then vice city was set in the 80s and then san andreas was set in the 90s vice city came out and it was 20 years before our real time gta 3 takes place 20 years ago from now oh remember how retro by city felt yeah that's gta 3 now in real time oh man i i hate comparisons like that tim and i wish to undo the last 30 seconds of my life
